name: Creat NetHunt records from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new record in NetHunt. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1okLvr6ySpoJQpUfrtj5BF4iRAzpjFFGM6AvgKDFiGro/edit?usp=sharing).
